title: An Act authorizing automated curb enforcement and improving parking violation procedures

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Crighton, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2639) (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Brendan P. Crighton for legislation to authorize automated curb enforcement and improving parking violation procedures.  Transportation.
